title: Linkin Park - Live in Salt Lake City, Utah 3-8-2008
description:
Here&#039;s the SBD from the Utah show, another LPLive.net release.

West Valley City, Utah 
E Center 
8th March 2008 

Setlist:
01. What I&#039;ve Done
02. Don&#039;t Stay
03. Somewhere I Belong 
04. Wake
05. Lying From You 
06. Papercut w/Points Of Authority outro 
07. In Pieces 
08. Numb
09. The Little Things Give You Away
10. Shadow Of The Day 
11. Valentine&#039;s Day 
12. Crawling
13. In The End
14. Bleed It Out w/There They Go verse 
15. In Between
16. Breaking The Habit
17. One Step Closer
18. Faint 


Show Notes:
- Yet another abbreviated setlist! This is basically the same setlist that the band did on March 4th at the Staples Center.
- After Rob&#039;s drum solo on &#039;Bleed It Out&#039;, Mike rapped the &#039;There They Go&#039; verse over the &#039;Bleed It Out&#039; beat for the first time that we know of, instead of doing the verse over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039; outro after &#039;Papercut&#039; like they had been doing for the abbreviated shows. 
- Since there was no &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;, the outro was tacked on to the end of &#039;Papercut&#039; as usual, but had no &#039;There They Go&#039; verse. However, for the first time on the outro, Mike played guitar!
